name: BetaAppLocalizationCreateRequest.Data.Attributes
desc: Attributes that you set that describe the new resource.

items.name: description
items.desc: A description of your app that highlights features and functionality.

items.name: feedbackEmail
items.desc: An email address to which beta testers can send feedback. Also appears as the reply-to address for TestFlight invitation emails.

items.name: locale
items.desc: The specified locale. Refer to Table 1 for possible values.

items.name: marketingUrl
items.desc: A URL with information about your app. This URL is visible to testers in the TestFlight app.

items.name: privacyPolicyUrl
items.desc: A URL that links to your company’s privacy policy. Privacy policies are recommended for all apps that collect user or device-related data or as otherwise required by law.

items.name: tvOsPrivacyPolicy
items.desc: Your company’s privacy policy. Privacy policies are recommended for all apps that collect user or device-related data, or as otherwise required by law.
